underlying_goal: To extract writing style guidelines from two 'gold standard' AI safety research papers to be used by a paper-writing agent.
friction_detail: Initial PDF reading attempts failed, requiring fallback to web search and local file access via sub-agents. The agent also had to be explicitly told to use sub-agents to handle large files.
primary_success: Successfully synthesized two distinct but complementary academic writing styles (empirical vs. conceptual) into a single, structured, actionable style guide.
brief_summary: User wanted to use two papers as style guides. After initial failures reading the PDFs, Claude used sub-agents to analyze them. It extracted key patterns for titles, abstracts, and rhetoric, created a comprehensive `paper-writing-style-guide.md`, and updated the `paper-writer` agent to use it.
